Apprentice Atra: You can choose an item of your choice if you have enough Mucrokian Hides or Contaminated Mucrokian Hides. Contaminated Mucrokian Hide are worth more and count as much as double of a normal Mucrokian Hide. In fact, we tend to favor those more and they will be deducted first those first before accepting normal Mucrokian Hides. What would you like?
